ul.li: Select All (or just the projects you want)
Select your USB Flash Drive or your U: drive, and make up a name. (If you use the U: drive you will have to email the archive to yourself, or logon from home and download it.)
Click Finish - let it write the stuff to your flash drive (or U: drive)
Replace the old file if it's already there
If the projects you want are already in your workspace at home, delete them first.
Select archive file --> Browse to the file you saved on your flash drive (or from email or school download). It ends in .zip
Select the projects you want to import - if they're already in the workspace, this won't work - they need to be deleted first.

page.h3: Bringing Your Eclipse Projects Back to School
